hero.title: ABOUT WATER DEPARTMENT
hero.heading: Water Department
hero.p1: The Water Department, under the Ministry of Energy and Water Resources of Jubaland State - Somalia, is responsible for the formulation and implementation of policies, programs, and regulations related to water resources. The Water Department plays a vital role in managing the region's water resources, ensuring sustainable use, and providing access to clean water. Projects aligned with their objectives help to advance their mission of fostering a healthy, sustainable, and resilient environment in Jubaland.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: Our mission is to ensure sustainable energy for all by promoting efficient use, fostering innovation, and empowering communities in Jubaland and beyond.

people.title: 25,000 People
people.text: Distributed Hygiene kits to access essential health services and improve well-being & quality of life.

boreholes.title: 92 Boreholes
boreholes.text: Constructed/Rehabilitated across Lower Juba & Gedo in 12 Districts.

shallowWells.title: 251 Shallow Wells
shallowWells.text: Constructed/Rehabilitated over 251 Shallow Wells in Jubaland.

kiosks.title: 226 Water Kiosks
kiosks.text: Constructed over 226 Water Kiosks serving IDPs in Jubaland.

waterBan.title: 38 Water Ban
waterBan.text: Constructed over 38 Water Bans to improve water distribution.

barkad.title: 790 Barkad
barkad.text: Constructed over 790 Barkad to enhance water storage across Jubaland.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: We prioritize sustainable practices to ensure the long-term availability of energy & water resources for Jubaland.

community.title: Community Engagement
community.text: We work closely with local communities to understand their needs and provide effective solutions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: We encourage new ideas and technologies to improve our services and meet future challenges.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.text: We maintain open communication and accountability in all our operations.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.text: We partner with various stakeholders to achieve common goals and enhance service delivery.
